thread.title: Ariana Grande's Nonna Is Not Having Her Granddaughter's Racy Lyrics in Concert Video
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande's Nonna Is Not Having Her Granddaughter's Racy Lyrics in Concert Video

title: Ariana Grande's Nonna Is Not Having Her Granddaughter's Racy Lyrics in Concert Video
text: Pin it Share Ariana Grande performed in Las Vegas on Saturday night with her grandma and brother sitting right in the front row. Grande's brother, Frankie, came decked out in Ariana Grande apparel and Snapchatted himself dancing and singing to all his sister's hit songs. Majorie Grande -- known as "Nonna," the Italian word for grandma -- was not quite so thrilled. Nonna sat with her chin in her palm or her hands in her lap for most of the show, appearing a bit underwhelmed. Her expression quickly changed, however, when Ari launched into expletive-filled lyrics while performing "Bad Decisions." Her grandma covered her mouth and looked stunned as her granddaughter sang, "Don't you know I ain't f***ing with them good boys?" and "Ain't you ever seen a princess be a bad b***h?" Watch the hilarious clip below:
